title: Вскрытие покажет
overview: About a detective bureau that investigates murders, about a team that cannot function without each other, only working together, it is possible to unravel the intricate crimes. Inga is a medical examiner, a super-pro, very scrupulous, straightforward, sharp, caustic - which is why she does not get along for a long time in one place. Operative, super-pro Oleg conducts investigations, arrests. Despite the specifics of her professional activity, Inga is quite satisfied with her work as a forensic scientist and will not exchange it for any other kind of activity. But the heroine climbs into other people's affairs, which greatly irritates the people around her. Colleagues try to stay away from her, which pushes Inga to constantly change jobs. This time she has to get a job as a mountaineering instructor.
